name: Legal Awareness
description: App is available for Android Users. We are working on iphone version and will inform you when it is done.  App has  - 100 plus articles that I had written to different newspapers since 2014 - App has all my videos , interviews  - App has an option where you can ask me questions. My team will reply to your questions.  - You can search the articles depending on keywords.  - To benefit more people the app is available as of now in English, Hindi and Urdu.  We have started translating articles in Hindi and Urdu  - As of now only few articles are available in Urdu and Hindi, We will be updating app with new Articles.  - To download app, Go to Google Playstore and type F A I Z A N M U S T A F A  - Or Give a missed call to 8099 88 11 88 , you will get app link as SMS , you can click link and install the App.  - Request all of you to install the app and share this videos to all your contacts
